entry.title: KE GONG
entry.content:
Biography

I am currently an algorithm team leader at X-Era AI. I used to be a senior researcher and a team leader of Intelligent Speech Group at DMAI. I received my Master Degree at Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab in Sun Yat-Sen University advised by Prof. Liang Lin.
Email: kegong936 AT gmail.com
Google Scholar

Research Interest

My current research interest is to develop generative AI techniques for human-computer interaction applications such as smart home as well as digital human.
I used to develop interpretable and structured machine learning techniques for computer vision tasks. I mainly investigated to exploit human commonsense and domain knowledge and further incorporated them to develop AIGC applications and the advanced artificial intelligence systems.

  • Talking-head generation, face editting, video style transfer
  • Speech recognition, voice cloning, and speech synthesis
  • Human-centric Analysis, including human pose estimation, human parsing
  • Object understanding, including classification, segmentation, detection

Academic Services

  • Reviewer for TPAMI, PR, CVPR, ICCV, NeurIPS, AAAI, ECCV, WACV, ACCV
entry.summary: Biography
